long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Tabs Overwhelming You? Turn Them into Tasks! 🗂️
Save. Organize. Focus.

Tame your browser chaos with the ultimate tab manager and todo task creator! Taskify Tabs lets you:

✅ Save tabs as tasks with due dates so you can close clutter and get reminders later.
✅ Search & filter tabs by domain, status, last accessed, or groups.
✅ Close tabs in bulk or convert them into categorized tasks in seconds.
✅ Edit, delete, and organize tasks to stay productive.
✅ Automate you tab management and task creation (Coming Soon):
     🦾 When the number of tabs of the same website reaches a specified number,
           group them for easy access, bookmark them into one folder or create a
           task for them so you can be notified of them later.
     🦾 When a tab is not accessed for a given period, close it or create a task for 
          it (and close it) so you can be notified about it and get back to it later.
     🦾 When the number of open tabs reaches a certain number, get notified so 
          you can start to organize them before things get out of hand
     🦾 When duplicate tabs are detected (you can specify the threshold), close all 
          but one so you don't have tabs running unnecessarily.
     🦾 And, many more automations coming soon........

🌟 Seamless Google Tasks Integration! (Coming Soon)
Sync your todo tasks with Google Tasks and receive reminders directly on your favorite devices. Stay notified and never miss a follow-up—whether you're on the go or at your desk.

🌐 Upcoming Integrations with Make and Zapier!
Take your productivity to the next level by automating workflows. Soon, you’ll be able to connect Taskify Tabs with thousands of apps to create tasks, manage tabs, and trigger actions in your favorite tools—all automatically.

🔍 Find what you need, close what you don’t, and free your mind.
Stop letting tabs overwhelm you—make them work for you!

📥 Install now and reclaim your focus.
